goals__remit:
A - Perform studies for, or advise, or represent EU stakeholders in regulatory aspects of: 
- international and EU trade 
- radio spectrum matters (free circulation of equipment, spectrum regulatory management,  at EU, European, or global levels) 
- associated standards 
- Electronic communications (infrastructure, services). 
       
B - Advise Panamanian & Central American Institutions and NGOs regarding cooperation with EU and EU funding
